mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorandum, New Room chimney and windows, Piazza, 1796
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandum in the hand of George Washington with dimensions of architectural details in and around the house -- piazza at west door: brick pavement between the tiles 5 feet 3 inches by 9 feet 6 inches; tiles are 12" square; stone margin around them of 6" on outer edge, 9" on inner next the house. --gives measurements of windows in the new room; the Venetian window is given in exact detail; the two smaller (or end windows); the dimensions of the chimney in the new room in detail. Autograph document, 2 pages, docketed "Windows &c New-Room Mount Vernon".
